Title: Atlas of Cardiovascular Computed Tomography
Author: ম্যাথিও জে. বুডফ
Summary:
Atlas of Cardiovascular Computed Tomography
The Atlas of Cardiovascular Computed Tomography includes photomicrographs, anatomic illustrations, tables, and charts paired with extensive legends and explanations, supplemented by extensive research, peer-reviewed articles, and textbooks. In addition to providing historical perspective and current directions for computed tomography, the atlas focuses on research involving coronary artery diseases and anomalies, congestive heart failure, atherosclerotic plaques and asymptomatic disease, as well as imaging techniques, including preparation, acquisition, and processing, involving the great vessels and carotids, the peripheral vasculature, and coronary and pulmonary veins. Also included is discussion of the role of computed tomography in the emergency room and in private cardiology practice.

Title: Atlas of Clinical Hematology
Author: জেমস্‌  ও. আর্মিটেজ
Summary:
Atlas of Clinical Hematology: Copublished with Current Medicine
Takes readers inside the visual science of hematology, combining color illustrations with descriptions of the clinically relevant advances in the field. This book focuses on the hematologic malignancies, emphasizing how an improved understanding of these disorders has served as a springboard to the development of anticancer treatments.

Title: Atlas of Infectious Diseases: Central Nervous System and Eye Infections, Volume- 3
Author: জেরাল্ড এল. মেন্ডেল এমডি এমএসিপি
Summary:
Atlas of Infectious Diseases: Central Nervous System and Eye Infections v.3: Central Nervous System and Eye Infections Vol 3 (Mandell's atlas of infectious diseases series)
University of Virginia, Charlottesville. Color photographic atlas of the etiologies and manifestations of central nervous system and eye infections, for infectious disease physicians, and pathologists. 19 contributors, 15 U.S.
Book_Title: Atlas of Infectious Diseases: Central Nervous System and Eye Infections,Volume- 3

Title: Bone's Atlas of Pulmonary Medicine
Author: এ. জরডান
Summary:
Bone's Atlas of Pulmonary Medicine
In the third edition of Bone's Atlas of Pulmonary Medicine, each chapter has been carefully reviewed and updated. Figures and references have been revised to include new advances on diagnosis and therapy. New authors have been recruited and several new chapters have been added, including chapters on sleep disorders, HIV and fungal infections, lower respiratory tract infections, and nutrition.

Title: Atlas of Cerebrovascular Disease
Author: পিলিফ বি. গোরিলিক এমডি এমপিএইচ
Summary:
Atlas of Cerebrovascular Disease (Current Medicine title)
Rush Medical College, Chicago, Illinois. Practical atlas and reference of stroke diagnosis, treatment, and risk factors. Also discusses atherosclerotic and nonatherosclerotic stroke mechanisms. Color and halftone illustrations. Trim size 12-1/2 x 10-1/4 inches.
